i18n.title: Initialize 2D Array
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore how to initialize a 2D array in JavaScript. We will use the Array.from() and Array.prototype.map() methods to create an array of given width and height, and fill it with a specified value. This lab will provide a hands-on experience of working with 2D arrays and understanding their implementation in JavaScript.

meta.title: Mastering 2D Array Initialization in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to efficiently initialize 2D arrays in JavaScript using Array.from() and Array.prototype.map().
meta.keywords: array from, 2d array, javascript, array initialization, javascript practice, array prototype map, javascript practice online, javascript lab, javascript tutor

verify.name: Verify Student's Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 初始化二维数组
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何在JavaScript中初始化二维数组。我们将使用Array.from()和Array.prototype.map()方法来创建一个具有给定宽度和高度的数组，并用指定的值填充它。本实验将提供使用二维数组并理解其在JavaScript中的实现的实践经验。

meta.title: 掌握JavaScript中的二维数组初始化
meta.description: 学习如何使用Array.from()和Array.prototype.map()在JavaScript中高效地初始化二维数组。
meta.keywords: from数组, 二维数组, JavaScript, 数组初始化, JavaScript实践, 数组原型映射, 在线JavaScript实践, JavaScript实验, JavaScript教程

verify.name: 验证学生对Node命令的使用
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，可以通过输入'node'并按下回车键来运行JavaScript。
